summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the month of August 2014. It details various debits and credits, including payments to individuals and entities, as well as incoming and outgoing transfers.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Mande Kirby
persons.context: Mande Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: W. Chester Brewer, Jr.
persons.context: W. Chester Brewer, Jr. is referenced in connection with an outgoing money transfer from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Mehmet Arda Beskardes
persons.context: Mehmet Arda Beskardes is mentioned in relation to an outgoing money transfer from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Adam Bly
persons.context: Adam Bly is referenced in connection with an incoming money transfer to Epstein's account.

connections.description: W. Chester Brewer, Jr. is identified as an attorney associated with an outgoing transfer from Epstein's account.
Mehmet Arda Beskardes is mentioned in relation to an outgoing transfer from Epstein's account, indicating a client-attorney relationship.
Adam Bly is referenced in connection with an incoming money transfer to Epstein's account, suggesting a financial relationship.

events.title: Account Summary Start
events.description: The account summary begins with a balance of $52,639,793.74 as of August 1, 2014.

events.title: Account Summary End
events.description: The account summary ends with an ending balance of $2,206,163.91 as of August 31, 2014.

events.title: Large Incoming Transfer
events.description: A significant incoming money transfer of $2,500,000.00 is recorded on August 19, 2014.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, Saint Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details financial transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for August 2014.
The account had a beginning balance of $52,639,793.74 and an ending balance of $2,206,163.91.
Significant transactions include a $2,500,000.00 incoming transfer on August 19, 2014.
Mande Kirby is noted as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.
Multiple outgoing transfers are made to various individuals and entities, including attorneys.
